workExperience.description: Utilized Python and SQL to conduct customer segmentation analysis using K-Means and PCA on large datasets. Created automated weekly reporting processes and developed Tableau dashboards to drive marketing strategies.
Analyzed business data to optimize operations for retail clients. Provided technical consulting services, designed data-driven solutions, and delivered actionable insights to support client projects.
Contributed to the management of the product lifecycle for a mobile app by gathering user feedback, defining requirements, and coordinating development and launch activities.

projectExperience.description: Led a team in analyzing customer behavior and sales trends, identifying key sales drivers, and proposing optimization strategies for an e-commerce platform.
Developed a personal finance app with real-time stock data APIs and budgeting tools to enhance user engagement through improved UI/UX.

education.description: Coursework included Data Structures, Algorithms, Machine Learning, SQL for Data Science, and Software Engineering Principles.
